title: LinkedIn Post - Cybersecurity Awareness
content:
ğŸ” Did you know that 43% of cyber attacks target small businesses, but only 14% are adequately prepared to defend themselves?

At Tony Tech Insights, we believe cybersecurity shouldn't be a luxury reserved for enterprise companies. Here are three affordable steps you can take today to protect your business:

1ï¸âƒ£ Enable multi-factor authentication across all your business applications
2ï¸âƒ£ Conduct regular staff training on recognizing phishing attempts
3ï¸âƒ£ Implement automated, encrypted backups of critical data

What simple security measure has made the biggest difference for your business? Share in the comments!

#CybersecurityMonth #SmallBusinessSecurity #TonyTechTips
image_description: Infographic showing statistics of small business cyber attacks with Tony Tech Insights branding

title: Twitter Post - Cloud Migration Benefits
content:
Moving to the cloud doesn't have to break the bank. Our clients typically see a 20-30% reduction in IT costs after migration, plus improved flexibility and security. 

Let's make cloud technology accessible for your business too.

content:

Did you know that 43% of cyber attacks target small businesses? Yet only 14% are prepared to defend themselves.

At Tony Tech, we're committed to protecting businesses of all sizes. Here are 3 simple steps every organization should take:

1ï¸âƒ£ Implement multi-factor authentication
2ï¸âƒ£ Train employees on phishing awareness
